Detailed Description

The crf pipe inherits from the basic eqOsg pipe, to add more features like event-adapting, scenegraph updates etc.

Override this class' functions to create your own dynmaic and event depended scene graph. If you do so, don't forget to create your own crfNodeFactory and pass it to crfStarter, to force the CRF to use your objects.

void crfPipe::convertEqEventsToOsg (  )  [protected, virtual]

Take the eq-events out of the _eventQueue in FrameData and pass it to the eqViewer.

Basic implementation, converts only basic keys yet.

This function can be OS depended, because eq does not report the same ascii codes for every windowing system! Actually all basic keys and some special keys are forewarded to the osg viewer. In Windows, the pushed ascii codes represent upper case letters.

void crfPipe::setUpViewer (  )  [protected, virtual]

This functions sets up the viewer.

Currently an OSG statshandler is added and listen to the F2 keystroke. Override this function to specify your viewer.

virtual void crf::crfPipe::updateSceneGraph (  )  [inline, protected, virtual]

Updates your scenegraph at the end of every frame.

Override this function to create your own frame/time related animations. Basic Implementation: empty!
